text: Budet li dostoyno Nashey mudrosti i spravedlivosti, yesli My uravnyayem blagochestivykh veruyushchikh i tvoryashchikh na zemle zlo nechestivtsev? Budet li dostoyno Nas, yesli my uravnyayem tekh, kotoryye boyalis' Nashego nakazaniya i zhili bogoboyaznenno, s temi, kotoryye vystupali protiv Nashikh ustanovleniy
